items.title: A Shady Deal
items.description: The party witnesses a back-alley deal go wrong between two thieves, leading to a frantic chase.

items.title: A Public Disturbance
items.description: A rowdy group of drunken adventurers has started a tavern brawl, causing chaos in the streets.

items.title: A Crying Child
items.description: The party finds a child sobbing, claiming a monster stole their favorite toy and ran into the sewers.
